{{Content bundle |rationale=This content bundle features a set of basic elements that are necessary for the Collaboration extension. }} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} [[Vendor::ontoprise GmbH| ]] [[Ontology version::140| ]] [[Installation dir::extensions/Collaboration| ]] [[Dependency::Smwplus; 153; 153| ]][[Dependency::Richmedia; 152; 152| ]] [[License::GPL v2| ]] ;This content bundle comprises a set of articles that are necessary to make use of the Collaboration extension. ;How to use Simply add the template call {{ShowComments|show=True}} into the article(s) to enable your users to leave comments for. Usually you include this template call at the bottom of the page. ;Sandbox We have created a small [[Collaboration_Sandbox|Sandbox of the Collaboration extension]] in this Wiki to give you a smooth start. ;User manual More information about the Collaboration extension and how to use it can be found in our [http://smwforum.ontoprise.com/smwforum/index.php/Help:Collaboration_Extension Collaboration extension help article at SMWForum]. ;This bundle contains these articles : {{#ask:[[Part of bundle::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] |?=Link |?Rationale |link=subject |default=''none'' |mainlabel=- }} [[Category:Content bundle|Content_bundle]] {{Content hash|value=a5b59c7c93de4673e7a007ab705bdafa}}

revision.comment: Created page with "<noinclude>{{Template |rationale=Shows an infobox of the most recent comments made by a user. This template should be called on a user's page. }} {{Part of bundle|value=Collabora..."
revision.text:
<noinclude>{{Template
|rationale=Shows an infobox of the most recent comments made by a user. This template should be called on a user's page.
}}
{{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}}
{{Content hash|value=}}
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#vardefine:query|[[Category:Comment]] [[Has comment person::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Modification date::+]]}} {{#vardefine:resultLimit|5}} {{#vardefine:resultNumber|{{#ask: {{#var:query}} | format=count}}}} 

{| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); margin: 0pt 0pt 0.5em 1em; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; position: relative; border-collapse: collapse; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; float: right; clear: right; width: 35%;"
|-
! style="background: rgb(237, 244, 252) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; color: black;" colspan="2" | Recent Comments ({{#var:resultNumber}})
|-
| {{#ask: {{#var:query}} 
|?Has comment text
|?Has comment rating
|?Has comment date
|?Belongs to article
| sort=Has comment date
| order=desc
| format=template
| template=Comment row for user
| limit={{#var:resultLimit}} 
| searchlabel= 
| link=none 
| default=*''no comments made yet''}}
|-
| colspan="2" | {{#ifexpr: {{#var:resultNumber}} > {{#var:resultLimit}} | <small>For all comments of {{FULLPAGENAME}} click [{{fullurl:Template:Comments overview|ofUser={{urlencode:{{FULLPAGENAME}}}}}} here...]</small>}}
|}</includeonly><noinclude>
</noinclude>

<noinclude>{{Template |rationale=Template for displaying the latest comments of a given user specified by the argument ''ofUser''. }} {{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}} {{Content hash|value=}} </noinclude><includeonly> == Comments {{#if:{{#arg:ofUser|}}|made by [[{{#arg:ofUser|}}]]|}} ==
{{#ask: [[Comment:+]] [[Has comment person::{{#arg:ofUser|+}}]] | ?Has comment person | ?Has comment date | ?Has comment text | ?Has comment rating | ?Belongs to article | sort=Has comment date | order=desc | format=template | template=CommentResult | link=none | limit=100 }}</includeonly>

<noinclude>{{Template
|rationale=Shows an info box of the best rated comments in this wiki.
}}
{{Part of bundle|value=Collaboration}}
{{Content hash|value=}}
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#vardefine:query|[[Article has average rating::+]]}} {{#vardefine:resultLimit|5}} {{#vardefine:resultNumber|{{#ask: {{#var:query}} | format=count}}}} 

{| cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="border: 1px solid rgb(170, 170, 170); margin: 0pt 0pt 0.5em 1em; background: rgb(255, 255, 255) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; position: relative; border-collapse: collapse; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; float: right; clear: right; width: 35%;"
|-
! style="background: rgb(237, 244, 252) none repeat scroll 0% 0%; -moz-background-clip: border; -moz-background-origin: padding; -moz-background-inline-policy: continuous; color: black;" colspan="2" | ({{#var:resultNumber}}) best rated articles 
|-
| {{#ask: {{#var:query}} 
|?Article has average rating
| sort=Article has average rating
| order=desc
| format=template
| template=Article row for comment ratings
| limit={{#var:resultLimit}} 
| searchlabel= 
| link=none 
| default=*''no article commented yet''
}}
|}</includeonly><noinclude>
</noinclude>
